articles.content:
Arguably of the most high profile transfers this summer is likely to involve Borussia Dortmund striker Erling Haaland, should he make a move to new surroundings.
The Norway international has been li… [+1267 chars]
articles.description: The Borussia Dortmund striker has been linked with Liverpool in recent months, along with a host of Europe's top clubs
articles.title: Erling Haaland has already told Liverpool what he thinks amid transfer links - Liverpool Echo

articles.author: Sourabh Kulesh
articles.content: Samsung Galaxy A52 5G has reportedly been spotted on the Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) website, suggesting imminent launch of the smartphone in India. Samsung launched a 4G variant with 90Hz displ… [+2277 chars]
articles.description: Samsung Galaxy A52 5G has reportedly been spotted on the Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) website, suggesting imminent India launch. Samsung launched a 4G variant with 90Hz display, and the 5G variant with 120Hz display debuted in Europe a few weeks ago.
articles.title: Samsung Galaxy A52 5G BIS Listing Suggests Imminent India Launch, May Come With 120Hz Display - Gadgets 360

articles.content:
AstraZeneca's vaccine is under mounting scrutiny and has faced dwindling support in Europe.
The U.K. reported 25 new cases of rare blood clots possibly linked to AstraZeneca Plc's Covid-19 vaccine, … [+2690 chars]
articles.description: The U.K. reported 25 new cases of rare blood clots possibly linked to AstraZeneca Plc's Covid-19 vaccine, adding to the numbers that have caused some European countries to adopt precautionary measures.
articles.title: UK Says 25 New Cases Of Rare Blood Clots Linked To AstraZeneca Vaccine - NDTV
